15213222222222221.content:
Kion was chasing after Janja while the rest of the Lion Guard were dealing with his hyenas and calming down the scared zebras.

Janja looked back and saw that he was a good distance ahead of Kion, so he laughed, "HAHA! Can't catch me, Kion!"

Kion growled, and willed himself to move faster.

A voice appeared from right next to him, "Why don't you leave him to me?"

Turning his head, Kion saw Full running next to him, she continued, "You're clearly tired, let me catch him."

Kion frowned, normally he would let her, but Janja made him so angry, he wanted to catch the hyena.

Growling, Kion snapped, "Leave him to me!"

At the end of his sentence, he bumped into Fuli, knocking both of them down.

Kion was furious, but he got up when he heard Janja laughing about this.

Kion narrowed his eyes, and chased after Janja with speed he didn't know he had.

Janja let out a yelp as he was pinned to the ground by a furious Kion.

Kion yelled, "Stay out of the Pridelands!"

Kion was about to roar, when he realized that his voice sounded a bit different.

Before he could ponder this, Janja ran away, and the rest of his hyenas followed.

The rest of the guard showed up, and began questioning Kion.

Since they were all speaking at once, it was impossible to understand what they were saying.

Kion held up a paw, "One at a time, please."

Beshte asked, "Fuli, do you know where Kion is?"

Kion's eyes widened, and he looked down to see, not his chest, but the underside of a cheetah.
15213222222222221.title: Possessing a friend

152132222222222212.content:
Kion jumped up and said, "Er...I knocked into he-him while we were chasing Janja. He must still be back there! I'll go check!"

Without waiting for anyone to respond, Kion ran away as fast as Fuli's legs would take him.

Once an acceptable distance, Kion panted, "Oh no, oh no, oh no...What am I going to do?"

Scrunching up Fuli's face, Kion said, "C'mon, c'mon, I can fix this! I can fix this!"
152132222222222212.title: Kion remains calm

1521322222222222121.content:
Is Kion invisible?

When Kion is invisible, he can possess people.
1521322222222222121.title: Ghost?

15213222222222221212.content:
Kion opened his eyes to see Fuli shaking her head.

Fuli groaned, "Urgh, What happened? Why does my head hurt?"

Kion...
15213222222222221212.title: Answers

152132222222222212121.content:
Kion answered, "We were chasing Janja, and we knocked into each other. I fell down, but you caught him. Good job."

Fuli responded, "I remember chasing Janja, but...urgh. My head really hurts."

Kion said, "Go lie down. You earned a break."

LINE BREAK

That night, Kion lay awake, trying to make sense of what happened.

Eventually, he decided he needed to tell someone, but who?
152132222222222212121.title: Lies

152132222222222212121222.content: How about someone who if they did overreact, then the guard and royal family wouldn't find out?
152132222222222212121222.title: Another friend?

1521322222222222121212221.content: Does Kion go to Jasiri?
1521322222222222121212221.title: Jasiri?

15213222222222221212122211.content:
Kion got up, and decided to look for Jasiri, deciding that if she knew, she wouldn't tell anyone else, and might even help him make sense of what happened.

After a quick run, Kion was in Jasiri's territory.

Kion started to yell for Jasiri, and after a few minutes, she appeared.

Jasiri yawned, "Kion? Is something wrong?"

Kion sagged in relief, "There you are. Listen, something really strange happened to me today, and I need your help in understanding what it was."

After quickly telling her what happened, Jasiri looked at him with a skeptical, yet concerned, gaze, "Kion, are you sure that's what happened?"

Kion nodded repeatedly, "Yes, I'm sure! I was in Fuli's body! I was controlling her, and she doesn't remember any of it."

Jasiri adopts a thoughtful look, "Tell you what, possess me, and I'll believe you."

Kion's eyes widen, "What?"

Jasiri answered, "You heard me."
15213222222222221212122211.title: A laughing matter?

152132222222222212121222111.content:
Kion rolled his eyes, "Fine, you win."

Shutting his eyes, Kion tried to remember the feeling he had right before he possessed Fuli.

The wind in his fur, the light on his back, feeling like he could live forever...

His thoughts were interrupted by Jasiri, "Whoa! Kion, where did you go?"

Kion opened his eyes and saw Jasiri right in front of him, looking around.

Confused, Kion spoke, "Huh? Jasiri, I'm right in front of you."

But Jasiri did not react to his words.

Kion got up and walked over to her, he poked her with his nose, and the next thing he knew, he was in a completely different position.

Before, he was standing up, leaning into Jasiri, trying to get her attention, but now he was sitting down, facing some rocks.

Kion asked himself, "What happened?"

Kion's eyes widened as he realized that Jasiri's voice came out of his mouth.

Kion chuckled, "Look's like I really can possess people."

Kion got up and walked over to a small river before trying to de-possess Jasiri.

After exiting Jasiri's body, Kion instantly became visible again, not that he noticed, and Jasiri shook her heard, "Urgh, what happened?"

Kion answered, "I possessed you and walked over to this river."

Jasiri's eyes widened at this, headache forgotten. After a few minutes of trying to make sense of this, she decided to believe Kion.

Jasiri and Kion spent a good amount of time laughing, joking, and testing his power. It turns out that repeated possessions dulls the headache effect.

When the fun started to die down, Jasiri spoke, "Hey, Kion?"

Kion responded, "Yeah?"

Jasiri asked, "Can you teach me ho to do this? It seems really cool!"

Before Kion could answer, he felt something that could not be described. But he knew he could teach anybody how to do this, but the feeling ended with a thought, 'Only one can learn.'

Should Jasiri be the only other person with this power, or should Kion pick someone else?
152132222222222212121222111.title: Seeing it from new eyes

1521322222222222121212221111.content:
Kion shuddered, before saying, "Somehow...I know I can teach you, but I won't be able to teach anybody else. You ready?"

Jasiri nodded vigorously.

Kion took a deep breath, before going invisible and possessing Jasiri.

Jasiri's body remained still, but inside the mind, Kion was in control.

Kion mentally sighed, and then he felt like the inside of his-Jasiri's-body was being liquified. Somehow though, it wasn't painful, it was more like water curving due to the direction of the river, and Kion felt like her could feel every drop of water.

...And then, everything felt normal for the lion cub.

Well, as normal as it could be for a lion cub to be in the body of a female hyena pup.

Kion opened his eyes, "Did it work, Jasiri?"

Kion started when he realized that he was still using Jasiri's voice.

But that surprise was nothing compared to what happened next.

Kion heard Jasiri answer, "Yeah, I think so."

Kion turned his head and saw a transparent Jasiri.

Kion's surprise must have been evident, for Jasiri laughed, "Wow, never thought I would see myself like this."

Jasiri walked around Kion, looking at the body, inspecting it, and finally said, "Got to admit it, I look amazing!"

Kion smirked and joked, "Don't you mean, I look amazing?"

The two burst out into laughter, sounding identical, even though only one set could be heard from anyone else.

Jasiri asks, "Hey, since we both have this power now, what happens if we both try to possess a body?"

Kion shrugs, "I don't know, let's try it out."

Jasiri walks into her body.
1521322222222222121212221111.title: Teach Jasiri

choices: Kion de-possesses Jasiri's body and they do what they talked about
15213222222222221212122211111.content:
The moment Jasiri re-entered her body, Kion felt her body getting heavier.

"Jasiri, are you in here?" he said in Jasiri's voice, though his, or rather Jasiri's, mouth also felt heavy to move.

"Yeah, I'm here alright," was the answer. Only problem was, the answer came out of the same mouth that Kion had used! Kion could actually feel his -Jasiri's- mouth move and talk, whithout him being in control of it!

"Hebi kabisa," said Kion. "That felt really weird."

"Then how do you think it is for me?" asked Jasiri, again using her own mouth, (currently shared with Kion), to talk. "I can hear my own voice talking and my own mouth moving, but I'm not in control of what they say. It's downright freaky!"

"Yeah, you're right about that," said Kion, still weirded out that his, no, Jasiri's, mouth had moved without him being in control, again. He then formed Jasiri's mouth into a grin.

"On the other paw," he said, "this whole experience does give a new meaning to the expression 'talking to yourself', right?"

"Indeed," chuckled Jasiri. "By the way, how come my, or should I say our, body feels so darn heavy?"

"If I had to guess," answered Kion, "I'd say it's because we are both in the same body. Since there are two of us in one body, it's likely that we both control it simultaniously. So if one of us tries to move, without the other performing the same action, the body would feel a lot heavier. Of course that's only a wild guess."

"But a good guess," said Jasiri. "We should see if it's the right one. Now, I'll move my left fore-leg and then you can try to move the right."

"Okay, Jasiri," said Kion. He did as she had said and lifted Jasiri's body's right fore-leg up. At the same time, he also felt her body's left fore-leg lifting up, indepentently of him. However, because both of Jasiri's fore-legs were lifted at the same time, Jasiri's body ended up falling on it's belly, causing both of the spirits in the body to feel the impact.

"I meant, we should move them seperately," complained Jasiri.

"Sorry about that," said Kion, while trying to get Jasiri's body to stand up again. But he found that he couldn't, though it wasn't for a lack of trying. Everytime he tried to move one of Jasiri's legs, he could feel that leg move to another spot immediately, causing it to look like Jasiri's body had spasms. Apperently, Kion and Jasiri had different ideas of how to move Jasiri's body back up.

"Well, this isn't working," said Kion.

"Agreed," said Jasiri. "At least we now know that we really do have to move in synch with one another to move our...I mean MY... body."

"Well, we could have found out in a better way," said Kion. "So, how do you suggest we get up?"

"Let me think," said Jasiri. It didn't take long for her to come up with an idea. "I've got it. I'll tell you how I'm going to move my body and then you just have to move it at the same time."

"Okay, it's worth a try," said Kion.

Jasiri then told Kion exactly how she intended to move her body. Kion listened carefully to what she told him. When she was done, he prepared himself.

"Are you ready?" asked Jasiri.

"Yep."

"Okay, then. One... two... three!"

On Jasiri's count of 'three', Kion tried moving Jasiri's body in the exact same way as Jasiri did. Of course, she did move her body slow enough, so that Kion could more easily match her movements. But since this was a first for both of them, Kion didn't completely match Jasiri's movements, wich resulted in their shared body's legs moving quite wobbly. Nevertheless, they still managed to get Jasiri's body standing up again.

"Hey, we did it!" exclaimed Kion, still using Jasiri's mouth.

"Yeah, but just barely," said Jasiri, using the same mouth. "You know what, Kion? I think we'd better learn how to properly move around like this, if we should decide to try it some other time."

"Yeah, that's a good point you have there, Jasiri," replied Kion. "I guess we had better start the training right away."

"Yep, but no sweat," said Jasiri. "We'll get the hang of this in no time."

But as always, that was easier said than done. If any animal would have come by at that moment, they would have seen an odd sight; a female hyena pup, with a look of great concentration on her face, walking almost in slowmotion, on VERY wobbely legs. Of course, none of those animals would ever have known that there was really two souls inside the hyena pup's body; her own soul and the soul of her best friend, a male lion cub. Likewise, they wouldn't have known that both the hyena pup and the lion cub were both in control of the hyena pup's body at the same time, nor that they were trying to move in perfect synch within the body, so they could walk normally without it looking strange. Neither would they have known, that since a hyena pup would naturally move in a different way to a lion cub, the cub in the pup's body would have great difficulty moving in the exact same way as his current body-mate.

Indeed, Kion had trouble adjusting to how Jasiri would move, since he was used to being in his own body; and while he had possessed Jasiri's body before, at that time he had been in complete control of it. And even then, he had still walked like he would have walked in his own body.

Ergo; even though Jasiri was moving her body as slowly as possible to give Kion the best chance to adjust, Kion still couldn't quite get it right. Sometimes he would move their shared body's legs faster than intended, causing Jasiri's body to do an awkward jump forwards. Other times he would place Jasiri's body's down on the ground slower than she did, resulting in her body giving an odd jerk. And the whole thing culminated in an incident, where Kion somehow got one of Jasiri's paws to step on a loose rock, then moving the leg a little too fast, resulting in a trip and sent the two-minds-in-one-body flat on their stomach, their legs sprawled out on either side of them.

"Man," groaned Kion. "Who would have thought it would be this hard to be sharing one body?"

"Well, no one said it would be easy to be two animals in the same body," retorted Jasiri.

"I know that, but still..." said Kion, as he and Jasiri got their body standing again. "I mean, we can barely even walk like this; what if Janja or someone else were to come by? Then we wouldn't be able to fight them off. We are close to their teritory, after all. Perhaps it's best if we try this two-in-one thing somewhere we know that Janja can't get to."

"Yet another good point," said Jasiri. "I think we'd better wait until we are back at the Pride Lands befor we try this again. At this rate, it'll take us forever to learn. And we would be very vulnerable."

"Yeah, we had better go back to normal and fast," said Kion. But just as he prepared to de-possess Jasiri, an interesting thought came to him.

"Hey, Jasiri?"

"Yeah?"

"I was just thinking; when I gave you this abillity, I ended up still possessing your body and you just re-possessed it while I was still inside."

"So?"

"Well, if I can possess your body and leave you as a spirit, maybe you could possess my body and leave me as a spirit."

"What are you getting at, Kion?" asked an interested Jasiri.

"Well, if you try de-possessing your body first, then when I leave it, maybe your body will still be there, but lifeless since no one would control it. Then, I will make myself solid again and then you could try to possess my body. Then when we both have control of my body, we could de-possess it like with yours, only this time I would go first and then you. If it works, then we can not only have gained the abillity to just remove our spirits from our bodies, instead of turning our entire body ghostly to possess someone, but we could also possess each others bodies! You can be me, while I can be you! We can both be each other simultaniously!"

"Oh, yeah," exclamed Jasiri exited. "That would be interesting! What are we waiting for?!"

She de-possessed her own body right away, leaving Kion as the sole occupant of her body.

"Come on, Kion! Hurry!" she called to her own body, which still had Kion inside. "I want to try being you as soon as possible!"

"I'm coming now, Jasiri!" answered Kion with Jasiri's voice.

What happens next?
15213222222222221212122211111.title: We're the same!

choices: Kion and Jasiri wake up and start to thoroughly explore each other's bodies
152132222222222212121222111111.content:
While Jasiri's soul watched her body, currently inhabited by Kion, Kion himself was getting ready to de-possess Jasiri's body.

"Well, here goes nothing," he thought.

Kion focused on the familiar feeling of leaving someones body. In no time at all, he was back in his spirit form, right in front of Jasiri's spirit form.

"Hi there," he managed to say to Jasiri, before they heard a thud coming from behind him. They both turned to see what had made that noise.

As it turned out, it was Jasiri's body that had made the thud. Kion had been right; without a soul inside the body, it just fell down on the ground, lifeless, although a closer look revealed the body to still be breathing. It was just not possible for it to do anything else, unless a spirit were to possess it again.

"Hey, it worked!" exclaimed Jasiri. "My spirit is now seperated from my body!"

'Yeah, it worked,' thought Kion. 'Thank the Great Kings of The Past for that. I wasn't sure if it would really work, but it did.'

Jasiri and Kion went over to look closer at Jasiri's unmoving body.

"This is really bizarre," said Jasiri, as she walked around her lifeless body to look at it from all sides. "It's almost like my body is sleeping. But I know this is no dream."

"Yep, but you might soon fulfil one," said Kion, as he made himself solid.

"Oh, yes," said Jasiri, walking closer to Kion. "This will be fun!" Her spirit form then walked right into Kion's body.

As soon as Jasiri entered his body, Kion felt the same thing he felt while in Jasiri's body; he was still in control of his body, but his body now felt much heavier, as he had to share that control with Jasiri.

"Well, that's the first part over with," said Kion's mouth, but it wasn't Kion that had said it!

If his body hadn't felt so heavy, Kion would have jumped ten feet in the air. Sure, he had already experienced this while he was in Jasiri's body, but hearing his own voice coming out of his own mouth was quite disconcerting.

"Hebi kabisa! You scared me, Jasiri."

"Now you know what I felt when it happened to me," said Jasiri, using Kion's mouth.

"Yeah, and you were right; this DOES feel freaky!" exclaimed Kion. He then snapped himself out of the freaky feeling and said: "But let's let go of that for now. We have an experiment to perform!"

Kion then tried to de-possess his own body. When he felt the familiar leaving-a-body feeling, he knew it had worked.

"Whiew, that's better. I could swear your body was getting heavier, the longer we were both in it," Kion heard his own voice say right next to him.

Now it was Kion's turn to watch in awe, as he saw his own body move, talk and even jump right in front of his spirit form. He then watched as his own body started to look itself over, then his body's head looked up and made eye-contact with his spirit-body.

"Well, this is surreal," said spirit-Kion.

"I know exactly what you mean," said Kion's body, or rather, Jasiri in his own body.

"Hey, I know you really want to try out my body a bit more, Jasiri," said Kion, "but I need you to de-possess my body for now."

"Awwww, do I have to?" pleaded Jasiri, making Kion's body's face look really sad. (In fact, Kion didn't even know he could look that sad.)

"Yes, you have to," insisted Kion. "We need to make sure that both of us can do this, or we could end up never becoming ourselves again."

"Oh, alright," sighed Jasiri, before she, somewhat reluctantly, de-possessed Kion's body.

Both Kion and Jasiri then looked on, as what had happened to Jasiri's body, now happened to Kion's; without a spirit in it, his still breathing body just collapsed to the ground with a dull thud.

Now it was Kion's turn to inspect his own breathing, yet otherwise lifeless, body. He was fasinated by the fact that he could now see himself from an outside perspective.

"So, what now?" asked Jasiri. It was clear that she was anxious to try out being Kion a bit longer.

"First, we need to go back into our own bodies," said Kion. "We need to make sure that we can really seperate our spirits from our own bodies, before we try being each other."

"Urgh, fine," groaned Jasiri. ('Is she really THAT anxious to try being me?' thought Kion.)

The two friends then possessed their own bodies. They de-possessed and re-possessed their own bodies a few times, just to make sure that they really could do it, and without any side-effects.

"That's fine, Jasiri," said Kion, as he de-possessed his own body. "Now can try it."

"Really?" beamed Jasiri, as she too de-possessed her own body.

"Yep," answered Kion. "Are you ready?"

"Ha, I've been ready for ages!" said Jasiri, as both she and Kion, in their spirit forms, took a 'ready-to-pounce' stance.

"Alright, then," began Kion. "On three! One... two... three!"

And on the count of three, Kion's lion-spirit jumped into Jasiri's hyena-body and Jasiri's hyena-spirit jumped into Kion's lion-body.

What now?
152132222222222212121222111111.title: Preperations for possessions

1521322222222222121212221111111.content:
Both Jasiri and Kion raised their heads simultaneously.

Upon seeing each other, they burst out into grins.

Kion stood up, and said in Jasiri's voice, "This is incredible! If someone told me that I was going to be a female hyena when I was younger, I would've thought they were crazy!"

Kion turned to look at Jasiri, and saw her closely examining her new tail, but it was difficult to get a good look at it, so she tried to catch it.

Seeing his own body chase after its tail made Kion laugh.

Jasiri rolled her eyes when she noticed Kion laughing, "Oh, please, don't tell me you're the least bit curious about my body."

Kion stopped laughing, "Well...I...uh..."

It was Jasiri's turn to laugh.

When she stopped laughing, she noticed that Kion looked very embarrassed, so she said, "Look, how about, when we're in each other's bodies, we don't feel embarrassed about whatever we do or laugh at the other person, ok?"

Kion looked at her with eyes so wide, Jasiri didn't know they could be that wide, before breaking out into a grin, "Sounds good to me!"

Jasiri grinned back, "So, what should we do now?"
1521322222222222121212221111111.title: Exploring each other's bodies

choices: Yes. They want to REALLY know what it's like to be in each others bodies
15213222222222221212122211111112.content: How about they just stand there a bit, to REALLY feel how their current bodies feels like?
15213222222222221212122211111112.title: Other

1521322222222222121212221111112.content: Does one of them run off the moment they possess the body?
1521322222222222121212221111112.title: Run off

15213222222222221212122211111122.content: Shall we skip ahead a few days to when they have a better understanding of their new powers?
15213222222222221212122211111122.title: Time skip?

choices: They swap bodies for a day
152132222222222212121222111111221.content:
Jasiri's spirit jumped from rock to rock, occasionally stopping to look around for something or someone.

After a few minutes of this, Jasiri noticed a large patch of grass big enough to hide what she was looking for on the ground near the river, and with a smirk, she jumped down to investigate it.

Not making a sound, due to her non-corporeal body, Jasiri started padding through the grass, and to her delight, her prize was hidden by the grass.

Lying down (Lion down if you like puns), with its eyes closed and light breathing, was her male, red and yellow furred, and tattooed with a roaring lion prize.

Kion's body.

Jasiri looked around quickly, and upon seeing no trace of Kion, prepared to possess his body.

But just before she could, she heard a feminine voice say, "I was wondering when you would show up."

Jasiri leapt back from shock and stared at the speaker, who had remained hidden in the grass, with wide, transparent eyes.

Jasiri's body stretched, and with a grin, trotted over to Jasiri, "Was all that talk about finding my body first just that? Just talk?"

Jasiri rolled her eyes, "Oh, shut up, Kion. At least I saw the stars tonights, while you were what? Just waiting on me? Sounds like I had the better night."

Kion laughed, "So, we've done body hide and seek, what should we do now?"

Jasiri shrugged, "I still want to try swapping bodies for a day."

Kion responded, "We've never done it for that long, what if something happens?"

Jasiri answered, "We'll never know if we never try."
152132222222222212121222111111221.title: Games

1521322222222222121212221111112211.content: Whose P.O.V. shall we follow?
1521322222222222121212221111112211.title: They swap bodies for a day

choices: Unknown to them, they were being watched
15213222222222221212122211111122111.content:
Kion thought to himself for a second, 'If everyone thinks that I'm Jasiri, then no one would wonder why I'm in the Outlands, and I might find out what's going on with Janja.'

Since his failed attempt at killing Jasiri, Janja and his clan have really stepped up, even managing to beat the Lion Guard a few times, much to Kion's shame and Simba's disappointment. But, if Kion could figure out how they got so clever so fast, then he might be able to stop them.

Out loud, he said, "Sure, let's give it a try."

Jasiri's spirit form gave her body a transparent grin before hopping into Kion's body, making it stretch before standing up. Skipping over to her body, Jasiri said, "So, we should probably tell each other how to act, right?"

So, for awhile, the two told each other how to act and what to do in certain situations before they separated with Jasiri heading towards Pride Rock, and Kion heading towards Jasiri's den.
15213222222222221212122211111122111.title: New Life for Kion

15213222222222221212122211111122112.content:
The next day, everyone who encountered the Lion Guard could tell that there was something different about Kion. Namely that he was acting so much happier than he usually did and talked to the people they had to help out longer than normal after the Lion Guard did their part.

But, no one complained about it, which just seemed to make 'Kion' even happier.
15213222222222221212122211111122112.title: Jasiri in Kion's body

1521322222222222121212221111112212.content: How about Kion runs off in Jasiri's body, only to be caught by a human poacher who has the same abilities as them, and also knows how to stop a spirit from de-possessing a body. Leaving Kion trapped in Jasiri's body by a human who wants to make money, and Jasiri has to help him out.
1521322222222222121212221111112212.title: Other

choices: To show the poacher where Kion's body is
To follow Kion's advice and run
15213222222222221212122211111122121.content:
Kion smiles at Jasiri, "All right, you win. We'll swap bodies for a day."

Jasiri's eyes widen in disbelief at how quickly Kion gave in, "Really?"

Kion smirked, "But, you'll have to catch me first!"

Jasiri watched as her own body ran away as fast as it could from her.

After a few seconds, Jasiri realized what just happened, and with a small grin, she whispered to herself, "So that's how you want to play, huh?"

Jasiri chased after her body before Kion could escape her sight.

The two laughed during the chase, which caught the attention of a nearby human, who whispered to himself, "Sounds like duplicate laughter...but one sounds more...hollow? Heh, I wonder how I'll catch these ones."

His question was answered a minute later when he saw what looked like a female hyena pup being chased by an almost identical (save for being transparent) female hyena pup.

He rolled his eyes and muttered, "Fools."

Kion, having too much fun, did not notice the unfamiliar scent, and Jasiri, currently not having a physical nose could not smell it.

Kion kept running, and looked back for a second to see Jasiri.

Just as he was about to stick Jasiri's own tongue out at her spirit, Kion was tackled to the ground by the poacher, who quickly slapped Kion's current butt, making the former prince yowl out in surprise, but just as Kion was about to bite the poacher, the human spoke, and somehow Kion and Jasiri could understand him, "I know you weren't born in that body. I know that because I can see the spirit of the one who was right behind you."

He looked up, right into Jasiri's shocked, transparent face, "Yes, I can see you."

Looking back down at Kion, he continued, "I put something on you, something that will prevent you from leaving that body, so don't try anything funny."

Kion was terrified, so much that he couldn't do or say anything.

Jasiri, on the other hand, managed to ask, "W-what do you want?"

To their surprise, the human really did understand, and thus see, Jasiri, "You're both going to take me back to this one's real body, and then I'll tell you what's next. Of course, you could refuse, but then I'll just take off with your friend and your body."

Kion yelled, "Jasiri! Don't! We can't let him capture you too!"

The human yelled at Kion, "Quiet!"

Turning back to Jasiri, he asked, "So, what's it going to be?"

To Kion's horror, Jasiri looked like she was hesitating with an answer rather than just escaping like he told her to. Kion shut his eyes and though, 'This chase was a horrible idea! Why did I do it?'

What does Jasiri decide?
15213222222222221212122211111122121.title: Horrible idea!

152132222222222212121222111111221211.content:
Jasiri couldn't look Kion in the eyes as she mentally apologized, 'Kion...I'm sorry, but if there's a chance...I won't let you get hurt.'

Jasiri said aloud, "Fine...you win...just...just don't hurt him."

Kion screamed, "NO!"

The poacher clamped Kion's jaw shut with his hand, and smiled at Jasiri, "Smart girl. Now, let's not waste time, shall we?"

Jasiri just turned around and started walking back, making sure not to look back and accidentally make eye contact with the lion inhabiting her body, lest she lose her nerve and end up with Kion getting hurt or worse.

Kion, was trying to de-posses Jasiri's body, but to no avail, whatever the poacher put on Jasiri's body kept him stuck in it, so he settled for glaring up.

After a few minutes, they made it back to the grass hiding Kion's body.

The poacher saw it immediately, and pointed at Kion's soulless body, "Get in."

Jasiri...

1521322222222222121212221111112212112.content: Does she try to possess him?

The poacher wins the battle of the wills

Jasiri noticed that the poacher was distracted, so she took the opportunity to leap into his body.

152132222222222212121222111111221211211.content:

Frowning, Kion thought to himself, 'Hebi Kabisa, Jasiri is fighting for me, and I can't do anything to help her.'

Kion continued to watch the human body spasm uncontrollably, before he noticed a big rock right behind the body.

Readying himself to pounce, Kion yelled out, "Jasiri, get out!"

Jasiri left the poacher's body, but before he could recover, Kion knocked him back, making him fall and hit his head on the rock.

He let out a groan before falling silent.

Kion stared at him to make sure he wasn't faking it, and once he was sure that the poacher wasn't, let out a sigh of relief.

Kion looked at Jasiri with a smile, "I think he's passed out now. We're safe."

Jasiri did not look as happy as Kion however, "Kion, can you de-possess my body?"

Kion's eyes widened, he tried to and...
152132222222222212121222111111221211211.title: Out cold

152132222222222212121222111111222.title: Stuck?

152132222222222212121222111112111.content:
Before Kion could de-possess Jasiri's body, he heard laughter, making his new hyena ears stand up. Jasiri gasped, showing that she also heard the laughter.

Spinning around, Kion saw Janja jumping down until he was right in front of Kion.

Kion and Jasiri glared at the older hyena, but since Janja could only see one of them, he smirked down at Kion, "So, what were you up to, Jasiri? I could hear you saying something about bodies and Kion, but I don't see that little cub."

Taking a sniff, he continued with a scowl, "But I can smell him. So...he was here, but he's gone now."

Janja smirked in an arrogant fashion, "So, you and the little prince, huh? You realize that you're a hyena, and he's a lion. It'll never work out."

Kion felt his fur ruffle, "Shut up!"

Janja laughed, "Denial! Love it!"
152132222222222212121222111112111.title: Messing with Janja

1521322222222222121212221111121112.content: Does Kion pounce on Janja before Jasiri could do anything?
1521322222222222121212221111121112.title: Pounce?

choices: Jasiri tells him it's all right
15213222222222221212122211111211121.content:
Jasiri scowled, and prepared herself to possess Janja before he could insult her friendship with Kion anymore.

But before she could, Kion made her body roar.

It was far from the loudest roar that she has heard, but louder than anything she ever produced when it was her body.

Janja was also surprised. So surprised that he didn't dodge when Kion pounced on him with a furious expression.

Jasiri watched, transfixed at the scene in front of her, as her body, being controlled by her lion friend, clawed at and bit the hyena that insulted her every chance he got if not trying to kill her.

It did not take long for the pain of the claw and bite marks that littered his pelt to make Janja decide to run away.

Twisting his legs around Jasiri's body, Janja used his superior weight and strength to knock Kion away.

Kion quickly got up, and was only able to glare at the retreating form of Janja as he ran away.

Kion let out a growl, which startled Jasiri out of her transfixed state as she stared at her body.

Jasiri said, "Hey, Kion?"

Kion immediately stopped growling, made Jasiri's eyes widen as the prince realized that he was still possessing Jasiri.

Kion turned to face the spirit of Jasiri, and said, "Sorry, Jasiri. He was just insulting our friendship...and I...I felt so angry. All I could think about was making him take back his words. I...I forgot that this was your body...if I got you hurt...I...the thought makes me feel sick!"

Kion made Jasiri's head shake itself, as if trying to get something off the head.

Jasiri was ready to talk, but Kion continued before she could talk, "I'm so sorry. I should not have done something like that, I don't want to control your life, and I already made a decision for you."

Kion shrugged, "None of these guys, we should find some sleeping further away from the rest, so we can have fun without waking anybody up and causing problems."

152132222222222212121222111121221121.content:

Kion immediately jumped up and hissed in his mother's voice, "Jasiri! What were you thinking?"

Kion watched as Simba's body smiled sheepishly, "I know, but I was really curious, besides, so long as we stay in these bodies, I'll treat you like a queen. In hyena society, a female is normally the leader."

Kion raised an eyebrow, "Oh?"

Jasiri smiled, "As long as we're in these bodies, I'll spoil you rotten."

1523322122211111.content:
Kion was exhausted after a long, and very busy, day of protecting the Pridelands. Between Janja and his hyenas scaring the zebras, the rockslide that ruined a lot of nests, and a few other things, Kion was done with the day. With a yawn, he plopped down and quickly fell asleep.

In his dream, everything was white...and poofy? Kion blinked and realized that he was inside of a cloud. Kion took a step forward before somehow and tripping, but only his head went through the cloud. What the young lion saw horrified him. The Pridelands were burning, its inhabitants being hunted without care, and above Priderock a large shadowy head of a lion watched this with glee.

Kion pulled his head back up and hyperventilated in shock at what he just saw. Kion heard a cough from behind him and spun around to see who was there. The leader of the Lion Guard recognized who it was, "Grandfather, what was that? What's going on? We have to do something!"

Mufasa replied, "Calm down, Kion. This is not real, at least not yet. Someone is planning to do this, and they will succeed if we don't change something."

Kion asked, "Change what?"

Mufasa answered, "The past. The Pridelands needs you to go into the past and change it to prevent this."

Kion frowned, "But, what could I do? Who would believe that I'm from the future?"

Mufasa bent his head down, "You would be placed in the body of someone from that time, giving up your life here. This means you will lose the roar. Do you understand?"

Kion gulped, "If I can stop that from happening, I'll do it."

Mufasa smiled gently, "I'm glad to hear it, you can also take someone else with you. But, they too, would have to give up their life here. If you do this, I recommend taking someone who knows the Outlands, as you will have to go there at times."

Kion nervously replied, "Well...I know a hyena who lives in the Outlands. Jasiri. But...can we ask her first? I don't want to force her to do this."

Mufasa nodded, and suddenly, Jasiri popped out of the cloud.

Jasiri looked confused as she looked around, but calmed down a little when she saw Kion, "What's going on here?"

Kion and Mufasa explained the situation to Jasiri, who agreed to help out because she didn't want the circle of life to be destroyed.

When do they get sent back to?
1523322122211111.title: Jasiri will be Simba. Kion will be Nala

info.brief_description: The circle of life moves in mysterious ways. Find out how in this Lion King story.
info.description:
In the Lion King, there has always been an air of mystery. Now, the characters are finding out what this means, as they begins to change...

-------

Basically, this is an expansion/body alteration story for the Lion King at heart, although for the sake of a good story I can overlook not including any examples of change. I would prefer good writing over straight fetish work, but the main aim of this story is to entertain :)

The list of changes includes, but isn't limited to:

Inflation
Body part expansion
Growth
Shrinking
Muscle increase/decrease
Age changing
Transformations
Pregnancy
*Weight Gain*

I am fairly tolerant over what I will allow here, but I will reserve the right to edit any chapters that do not reach a certain quality. (IE, are riddled with basic mistakes)

However, I will not allow weight gain in this story. As much as I would want to see it, there are already two Lion King weight gain stories, and I don't think a third is necessary. As one of the Lion King weight gain stories has disappeared, and the other two cater exclusively for one gender each and have limited options available, I am now allowing weight gain storylines to be added to this story.

The characters may be made anthros in the story, either as a transformation or in general, as long as it is stated at the start of the branch.

Other than that, don't kill off the characters without asking me first (I will allow it for a good story reason), and have fun while making this a good story :)
